description: Returns information about a built-in intent. This operation requires permission for the lex:GetBuiltinIntent action.

parameters.name: signature
parameters.description: The unique identifier for a built-in intent. To find the signature for an intent, see Standard Built-in Intents in the Alexa Skills Kit.

nested_items.name: signature
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for a built-in intent.

nested_items.name: supportedLocales
nested_items.description: A list of locales that the intent supports.

nested_items.name: slots
nested_items.description: An array of BuiltinIntentSlot objects, one entry for each slot type in the intent.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: A list of the slots defined for the intent.
